```{r}
library(tmap)
library(sf)
library(raster)
```

```{r}
download.file("https://github.com/espm-157/spatial-template/releases/download/data/annual_npp.tif", "npp.tif")
download.file("https://github.com/espm-157/spatial-template/releases/download/data/average_annual_sst_2008.tif", "sst.tif")
npp <- raster('npp.tif')
sst <- raster('sst.tif') %>% projectRaster(npp)
```  

```{r}
tm_shape(sst) + tm_raster()
```
